title: Storm Update: State of Emergency, Indictments Revealed! Trump's Great Awakening 12-30-17

By Bernie Suarez
As we speak, America is now in a state of emergency. The reason? Because it’s time to bring in the criminals who have looted America for many decades. Court records from a Nevada Court now show that indictments have indeed begun. Are these indictments part of Trump’s storm? What will be revealed next and who will be taken down during this storm? We shall soon find out.
